t: Amazon.com: Customer reviews: Krinos Ouzo Candy - 10.6 oz Gift Box
s: I read reviews on Walmart where people said the candies had holes or were different sizes and they felt they got the defective ones. That is not the case here, each candy is fully round, smooth and full of flavor. The box states product of Greece and the brand Krinos.
